    def test_reconnect_device(self, init_btphone):

        连接设备异常失败测试用例

        btphone_page, connect_page = init_btphone
        btphone_page.conn_bt_elem.click()

        logger.info('蓝牙开关属性为: {}'.format(text))
    
        # 确保蓝牙打开
        if text == 'true':
            logger.info('蓝牙已打开')
        else:
            connect_page.bt_button_elem.click()
